author: National Bureau
text:
From Feb. 15, only six tickets can be booked in a month by a single user ID

From February 15, a maximum of six tickets can be booked in a month by a single user ID on IRCTC website, the Indian Railways said on Thursday. Now, a user can book 10 tickets through the website in a month. The step has been taken to “prevent possible misuse” by touts, the Railways said.

The present norm s which allows booking of two opening tatkal tickets during 10 a.m.-12 p.m. and two opening advance reservation tickets during 8-10 a.m. in a day will continue.
title: New rule on online booking
